quote: I couldn't put it down! The plot twists kept me guessing until the very last page. Mungati enock has mastered the art of suspense.
author: Sarah Johnson

quote: A masterpiece of historical fiction. enock transports you to another time and place with such vivid detail you feel like you're living the story.
author: Michael Kitaaka

quote: The character development is extraordinary. I found myself thinking about these characters long after I finished the book.
author: Jessica Nakamate
